title: Mexidol
description: Mexidol (ethylmethylhydroxypyridine succinate) is an antioxidant and neuroprotective drug. It is used to treat various neurological disorders, including stroke, head trauma, and cerebrovascular insufficiency. It helps protect brain cells from oxidative stress and improves blood circulation in the brain.

title: Ventolin
description: Ventolin (albuterol/salbutamol) is a short-acting beta-2 adrenergic receptor agonist used as a rescue inhaler for quick relief of asthma symptoms and bronchospasm. It works by relaxing smooth muscle in the airways, making breathing easier during asthma attacks or episodes of breathlessness.

title: Aspirin
description: Aspirin is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to reduce pain, fever, or inflammation. It is commonly used to treat conditions such as headaches, muscle pain, arthritis, and minor aches and pains. It also helps prevent blood clots, reducing the risk of heart attacks and strokes.

title: Paracetamol
description: Paracetamol, also known as acetaminophen, is a widely used over the counter medication for relieving mild to moderate pain and reducing fever. It is often used for headaches, muscle aches, colds, and flu like symptoms. Unlike nonsteroidal anti inflammatory drugs, it does not have significant anti inflammatory properties.

title: Ibuprofen
description: Ibuprofen is a common nonsteroidal anti inflammatory drug used to treat pain, fever, and inflammation. It is frequently used for conditions such as arthritis, menstrual cramps, migraines, and muscle aches. It works by blocking the production of certain chemicals in the body that cause inflammation and pain.

title: Amoxicillin
description: Amoxicillin is a broad spectrum antibiotic belonging to the penicillin class. It is commonly prescribed to treat bacterial infections such as respiratory tract infections, urinary tract infections, ear infections, and skin infections. It works by inhibiting bacterial cell wall synthesis, leading to bacterial death.

title: Metformin
description: Metformin is an oral medication used to manage type two diabetes. It helps control blood sugar levels by decreasing glucose production in the liver and improving insulin sensitivity. It is often used as a first line treatment for diabetes and can help prevent complications such as nerve damage and kidney disease.

title: Lisinopril
description: Lisinopril is an angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor used to treat high blood pressure and heart failure. It helps relax blood vessels, reducing strain on the heart and improving blood flow. It is also prescribed to improve survival rates after a heart attack and to protect kidney function in diabetic patients.

title: Atorvastatin
description: Atorvastatin is a statin medication used to lower cholesterol levels and reduce the risk of cardiovascular disease. It works by inhibiting an enzyme involved in cholesterol production in the liver. It is often prescribed to patients at risk of heart attacks, strokes, and other heart related complications.

title: Omeprazole
description: Omeprazole is a proton pump inhibitor used to treat conditions such as gastroesophageal reflux disease, stomach ulcers, and acid reflux. It works by reducing the amount of acid produced in the stomach, relieving symptoms such as heartburn and preventing damage to the esophagus.

title: Cetirizine
description: Cetirizine is a second generation antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms such as runny nose, sneezing, itching, and hives. It is commonly used for hay fever and chronic urticaria. Unlike first generation antihistamines, it causes less drowsiness and has a longer duration of action.

title: Losartan
description: Losartan is an angiotensin two receptor blocker used to treat high blood pressure and protect kidney function in diabetic patients. It helps relax blood vessels, lowering blood pressure and reducing the risk of strokes and heart attacks.

title: Simvastatin
description: Simvastatin is a cholesterol lowering medication that belongs to the statin class. It helps reduce the risk of heart disease and stroke by lowering bad cholesterol and triglyceride levels while increasing good cholesterol.

title: Furosemide
description: Furosemide is a loop diuretic used to treat fluid retention associated with conditions such as heart failure, kidney disease, and liver disease. It works by increasing the excretion of sodium and water through urine, helping to reduce swelling and lower blood pressure.

title: Alprazolam
description: Alprazolam is a benzodiazepine used to treat anxiety and panic disorders. It works by enhancing the effects of GABA, a natural calming chemical in the brain.

title: Budesonide
description: Budesonide is a corticosteroid used in inhalers for asthma and nasal sprays for allergies. It's also used orally for inflammatory bowel diseases like Crohn's disease.

title: Candesartan
description: Candesartan is an angiotensin receptor blocker used to treat high blood pressure and heart failure. It helps protect the heart, kidneys, and blood vessels.

title: Desvenlafaxine
description: Desvenlafaxine is an SNRI antidepressant used to treat major depressive disorder. It works by increasing the levels of serotonin and norepinephrine in the brain.

title: Empagliflozin
description: Empagliflozin is an SGLT2 inhibitor used to treat type 2 diabetes and reduce the risk of cardiovascular death. It works by helping the kidneys remove glucose from the bloodstream.

title: Fexofenadine
description: Fexofenadine is an antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms such as runny nose, sneezing, and itchy eyes. It's a non-drowsy alternative to older antihistamines.

title: Glimepiride
description: Glimepiride is a sulfonylurea medication used to treat type 2 diabetes. It works by stimulating the release of insulin from the pancreas to lower blood sugar levels.

title: Hydroxyzine
description: Hydroxyzine is an antihistamine used to treat anxiety, allergic conditions, and as a sleep aid. It can also help with nausea and as a sedative before surgery.

title: Irbesartan
description: Irbesartan is an angiotensin receptor blocker used to treat high blood pressure and protect kidney function in people with type 2 diabetes.

title: Levetiracetam
description: Levetiracetam is an anticonvulsant medication used to treat epilepsy and prevent seizures. It can be used alone or in combination with other seizure medications.

title: Mirtazapine
description: Mirtazapine is an atypical antidepressant that also helps with sleep and appetite. It's often used when other antidepressants haven't worked or aren't suitable.

title: Naltrexone
description: Naltrexone is used to treat alcohol and opioid dependence. It works by blocking the effects of opioids and reducing the urge to drink alcohol.

title: Oxybutynin
description: Oxybutynin is used to treat overactive bladder and reduce urinary urgency. It helps relax the bladder muscles and improve bladder control.

title: Perindopril
description: Perindopril is an ACE inhibitor used to treat high blood pressure, heart failure, and to prevent heart attacks and strokes. It also helps protect the kidneys.

title: Quetiapine
description: Quetiapine is an atypical antipsychotic used to treat schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, and major depression. It can also help with sleep and anxiety.

title: Rivaroxaban
description: Rivaroxaban is a direct oral anticoagulant used to prevent blood clots and reduce the risk of stroke in people with atrial fibrillation.

title: Sitagliptin
description: Sitagliptin is a DPP-4 inhibitor used to treat type 2 diabetes. It works by increasing insulin production and decreasing glucagon levels.

title: Tadalafil
description: Tadalafil is used to treat erectile dysfunction, benign prostatic hyperplasia, and pulmonary arterial hypertension. It works by relaxing blood vessels and improving blood flow.

title: Valsartan
description: Valsartan is an angiotensin receptor blocker used to treat high blood pressure, heart failure, and to improve survival after heart attacks.

title: Fluoxetine
description: Fluoxetine is a selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor (SSRI) antidepressant used to treat major depressive disorder, bulimia nervosa, obsessive-compulsive disorder, panic disorder, and premenstrual dysphoric disorder.

title: Metoprolol
description: Metoprolol is a beta-blocker that treats high blood pressure, angina, and heart failure. It's also used to prevent heart attacks and reduce migraine headaches.

title: Diazepam
description: Diazepam is a benzodiazepine used to treat anxiety, alcohol withdrawal, muscle spasms, and seizures. It works by enhancing the effects of GABA in the brain.

title: Citalopram
description: Citalopram is an SSRI antidepressant used primarily for major depressive disorder and anxiety disorders. It helps improve energy levels, feelings of well-being, and sleep quality.

title: Prednisolone
description: Prednisolone is a corticosteroid used to treat various inflammatory conditions, allergic disorders, and autoimmune diseases. It reduces inflammation and suppresses the immune system.

title: Amlodipine
description: Amlodipine is a calcium channel blocker used to treat high blood pressure and angina. It works by relaxing blood vessels and improving blood flow.

title: Warfarin
description: Warfarin is an anticoagulant (blood thinner) used to prevent blood clots, heart attacks, and strokes, particularly in people with atrial fibrillation or artificial heart valves.

title: Azithromycin
description: Azithromycin is a macrolide antibiotic used to treat various bacterial infections including respiratory infections, skin infections, ear infections, and sexually transmitted diseases.

title: Bisoprolol
description: Bisoprolol is a beta-blocker used to treat high blood pressure and heart failure. It helps reduce the workload on the heart and improve heart function.

title: Ramipril
description: Ramipril is an ACE inhibitor used to treat high blood pressure, heart failure, and to improve survival after heart attacks. It also helps protect the kidneys in people with diabetes.

title: Fluticasone
description: Fluticasone is a corticosteroid used in nasal sprays and inhalers to treat allergies, asthma, and other respiratory conditions. It reduces inflammation in the airways.

title: Clonazepam
description: Clonazepam is a benzodiazepine anticonvulsant used to prevent and treat seizures, panic disorder, and anxiety. It works by calming the brain and nerves.

title: Esomeprazole
description: Esomeprazole is a proton pump inhibitor that reduces stomach acid production. It treats gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), ulcers, and other conditions where stomach acid needs to be reduced.

title: Olanzapine
description: Olanzapine is an atypical antipsychotic medication used to treat schizophrenia and bipolar disorder. It can also help with treatment-resistant depression.

title: Carvedilol
description: Carvedilol is a beta-blocker used to treat heart failure and high blood pressure. It also helps prevent further damage after a heart attack.

title: Acarbose
description: Acarbose is an alpha-glucosidase inhibitor used to treat type 2 diabetes. It works by slowing down the digestion of carbohydrates to help control blood sugar levels after meals.

title: Bupropion
description: Bupropion is an antidepressant also used for smoking cessation. It works differently from other antidepressants by affecting dopamine and norepinephrine levels.

title: Cyclobenzaprine
description: Cyclobenzaprine is a muscle relaxant used to treat muscle spasms and pain. It helps relieve skeletal muscle conditions along with rest and physical therapy.

title: Doxycycline
description: Doxycycline is a tetracycline antibiotic used to treat various bacterial infections, including acne, respiratory infections, and certain sexually transmitted diseases.

title: Ezetimibe
description: Ezetimibe is a cholesterol-lowering medication that works by reducing cholesterol absorption in the intestines. It's often used in combination with statins.

title: Famotidine
description: Famotidine is a histamine-2 blocker that reduces stomach acid production. It's used to treat and prevent ulcers, heartburn, and other digestive conditions.

title: Gliclazide
description: Gliclazide is a sulfonylurea medication used to treat type 2 diabetes. It stimulates the pancreas to produce more insulin and helps the body use insulin more effectively.

title: Hydralazine
description: Hydralazine is a vasodilator used to treat high blood pressure and heart failure. It works by relaxing blood vessels to improve blood flow.

title: Isosorbide
description: Isosorbide is a nitrate medication used to prevent angina (chest pain). It works by relaxing blood vessels to improve blood flow to the heart.

title: Lamotrigine
description: Lamotrigine is an anticonvulsant medication used to treat epilepsy and bipolar disorder. It works by stabilizing electrical activity in the brain.

title: Memantine
description: Memantine is used to treat moderate to severe Alzheimer's disease. It works by regulating the activity of glutamate, a chemical involved in learning and memory.

title: Nifedipine
description: Nifedipine is a calcium channel blocker used to treat high blood pressure and angina. It helps relax blood vessels and improve blood flow.

title: Ondansetron
description: Ondansetron is an antiemetic medication used to prevent nausea and vomiting caused by chemotherapy, radiation therapy, and surgery.

title: Pioglitazone
description: Pioglitazone is a thiazolidinedione medication used to treat type 2 diabetes. It works by improving insulin sensitivity in the body's tissues.

title: Raloxifene
description: Raloxifene is a selective estrogen receptor modulator used to treat and prevent osteoporosis in postmenopausal women. It also reduces the risk of breast cancer.

title: Sumatriptan
description: Sumatriptan is a triptan medication used to treat migraine headaches. It works by narrowing blood vessels around the brain and reducing inflammation.

title: Tamsulosin
description: Tamsulosin is an alpha-blocker used to treat symptoms of an enlarged prostate (benign prostatic hyperplasia). It helps relax bladder and prostate muscles.

title: Topiramate
description: Topiramate is an anticonvulsant medication used to prevent seizures and migraine headaches. It's also sometimes used for weight loss and mood disorders.

title: Varenicline
description: Varenicline is a smoking cessation aid that helps reduce cravings and withdrawal symptoms. It works by partially stimulating nicotine receptors in the brain.

title: Zolpidem
description: Zolpidem is a sedative-hypnotic medication used to treat insomnia. It works by affecting chemicals in the brain that may be unbalanced in people with sleep problems.

title: Adalimumab
description: Adalimumab is a biologic medication used to treat various autoimmune conditions including rheumatoid arthritis, psoriasis, and inflammatory bowel disease. It works by blocking TNF-alpha, reducing inflammation in the body.

title: Baclofen
description: Baclofen is a muscle relaxant and antispastic agent used to treat muscle spasms, especially those caused by multiple sclerosis and spinal cord injuries.

title: Carbidopa-Levodopa
description: Carbidopa-Levodopa is a combination medication used to treat Parkinson's disease symptoms. Levodopa converts to dopamine while carbidopa prevents the conversion from happening before it reaches the brain.

title: Dabigatran
description: Dabigatran is a direct thrombin inhibitor anticoagulant used to prevent blood clots and reduce stroke risk in people with atrial fibrillation.

title: Exenatide
description: Exenatide is a GLP-1 receptor agonist used to treat type 2 diabetes. It works by stimulating insulin production, reducing glucagon, and slowing stomach emptying.

title: Finasteride
description: Finasteride is used to treat male pattern baldness and enlarged prostate. It works by blocking the conversion of testosterone to dihydrotestosterone.

title: Guanfacine
description: Guanfacine is used to treat attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) and high blood pressure. It works by affecting certain areas of the brain to improve attention and behavior.

title: Haloperidol
description: Haloperidol is an antipsychotic medication used to treat schizophrenia, acute psychotic states, and severe behavior problems. It can also control tics and vocal utterances in Tourette's syndrome.

title: Ivabradine
description: Ivabradine is used to treat chronic heart failure and inappropriate sinus tachycardia. It works by slowing the heart rate through specific action on the heart's pacemaker activity.

title: Ketamine
description: Ketamine is used as an anesthetic and for treatment-resistant depression. It works by blocking NMDA receptors in the brain, providing rapid relief from severe depression symptoms.

title: Liraglutide
description: Liraglutide is a GLP-1 receptor agonist used for type 2 diabetes and weight management. It helps control blood sugar levels and reduces appetite.

title: Modafinil
description: Modafinil is a wakefulness-promoting agent used to treat excessive sleepiness caused by narcolepsy, sleep apnea, and shift work sleep disorder.

title: Nivolumab
description: Nivolumab is an immunotherapy medication used to treat various types of cancer. It works by helping the immune system attack cancer cells.

title: Ozanimod
description: Ozanimod is used to treat multiple sclerosis and ulcerative colitis. It works by preventing immune cells from reaching the brain, spinal cord, and intestines.

title: Paliperidone
description: Paliperidone is an atypical antipsychotic used to treat schizophrenia and schizoaffective disorder. It works by helping to restore the balance of certain natural substances in the brain.

title: Ranolazine
description: Ranolazine is used to treat chronic angina. It works by improving blood flow to help prevent chest pain, but it does not treat an angina attack that has already begun.

title: Sacubitril-Valsartan
description: Sacubitril-Valsartan is a combination medication used to treat heart failure. It works by improving the heart's ability to pump blood and by reducing stress on the heart.

title: Tofacitinib
description: Tofacitinib is a JAK inhibitor used to treat rheumatoid arthritis, psoriatic arthritis, and ulcerative colitis. It works by decreasing immune system activity.

title: Umeclidinium
description: Umeclidinium is a long-acting anticholinergic medication used to treat chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD). It helps relax and open airways to make breathing easier.

title: Vortioxetine
description: Vortioxetine is an antidepressant used to treat major depressive disorder. It works through multiple actions on serotonin receptors and reuptake inhibition.
